entries.title: ChatGPT passes MBA exam given by a Wharton professor
entries.description: Research conducted by a professor at University of Pennsylvania’s Wharton School found that the AI-driven chatbot GPT-3 was able to pass the final exam for the school's MBA program.

entries.title: Microsoft invests billions in ChatGPT-maker OpenAI
entries.description: Microsoft says it is making a “multiyear, multibillion dollar investment” in the artificial intelligence startup OpenAI, maker of ChatGPT and other tools that can write readable text and generate new images.

entries.title: Spotify to cut 6% of jobs, content head to depart
entries.description: Spotify said on Monday it plans to cut 6% of its workforce and would take a related charge of up to nearly $50 million, that would add to the massive layoffs in the technology sector in preparation for a possible recession.
